page.title: 05CRADLEY NATURE DIARY-SPRING
page.content: { April}3rd.Bumble bees and Honey bees out of hibernation.Frog spawn in pond.4th.Wrens nest in Yew Tree. 5th.Bats out of hibernation. 22nd.Tadpoles hatched out. 23rd.Blossom on damson,cherry and plum trees.30th.heard cuckoo,nuthatch seen in acacia tree. {May}1st.Swifts are back.5th.swallows are back.8th.hops have started to grow.10th.Cowslips are out. 22nd.Jackdaws and sparrows are nesting.Sheep shearing at Church Farm. Cow parsley is out. {June}10th.Horse Chestnut in flower. Yellow Hammer seen at Kings Bridge. 13th swifts flying low.14th a lot of Oak apples this year.Green Oak Tortrix moth caterpillars seen hanging from Oak trees.Dragonfly larva eating tadpole in pond.21st.Hops way up strings.Dog roses and Honeysuckle out.
